survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from individuals who use electric bikes for commuting to understand their experiences, challenges, and satisfaction levels.

questions.question_text: How often do you use an electric bike for commuting?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use an electric bike for commuting?

questions.question_text: What are the primary reasons you choose an electric bike for commuting? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice responses. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What are the primary reasons you choose an electric bike for commuting? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the battery life of your electric bike?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the battery life of your electric bike?

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face while using an electric bike for commuting?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What challenges do you face while using an electric bike for commuting?

questions.question_text: How safe do you feel when commuting with your electric bike?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for safety perception. Ensure the scale is intuitive.

script.question_text: How safe do you feel when commuting with your electric bike?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for electric bike infrastructure in your area?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather suggestions. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for electric bike infrastructure in your area?
